author: jgm
content: That's what I would have though.  It looks like many (all?) of the blocks with odd eth1 votes are coming from nimbus nodes: <@&595681804422479873>  any thoughts?

author: etan_status
content: don't think so, the REST API had a non-standard encoding, but nimbus doesn't use external deposit snapshots by default, so doubt that this relates to the incorrect votes at all

author: etan_status
content: my suspicion is on EL providing incomplete `eth_getLogs` response. we pull block information from there, and then fill in the gaps between the logs with empty blocks. Would be great to know what EL is involved here, without logs it's difficult to debug / replicate.
